splash.headline:
Invest and secure your future
with Bitcoin.
splash.tagline:
The current state of the economy makes it necessary.
Why not gain wealth when everybody else does it?
splash.rarification: Free for life if register before December
splash.alphaNotifier:
* All banking-like features for your Bitcoin are added incrementally
and are not fully available in the alpha version.

video.text:
Save smarter, Send faster, Protect better.
And additionally, you save on unnecessary banking fees.

inflation.headline_2: Because inflation eats up your savings - everyday.
inflation.headline_text:
You must have noticed how the purchase of bread, milk, and eggs pushes up the bill at the cash register.
In comparison: If you bought bitcoin five years ago, saving 50 $ every week has turned $13,050 into $27,563.
inflation.subheadline:
You are losing cash
with money in your bank
inflation.text:
Endless money printing has taken away a lot of money from you. This has also led to the economy crumbling.

With NewFinance and Bitcoin you get:
inflation.benefit1_2: as it is limited to 21M coins

future.headline_1: Invest and secure your future with Bitcoin.
future.headline_2: The current state of the economy makes it necessary.
future.headline_text:
The project for NewFinance was initially created to built an absolute secure place for our money, protect it in
volatile times and make it accessible no matter what. Now we want you to have that opportunity.
future.text:
From doctors, over students, to high school teachers — everyone
can invest, grow and protect their wealth.
future.buttonInfo: Take the first step in under 2 minutes

features.headline_text:
Sometimes it’s hard to use Bitcoin as independent money, when you get your paycheck per SEPA transfer and not bitcoin.
That’s why we integrate banking features for bitcoin. So it’s easier for you.

qualities.headline_1: Let's get rid of rich folks
qualities.headline_2: sitting on the pile of money
qualities.first: Unstable banking systems put everyone's money at risk — from individuals to businesses — but we're all dependent on it.
qualities.second: With our private bitcoin account, you disconnect yourself from banks and keep only their benefits.
qualities.third: That way, only you manage your money on your own terms, and stay ahead of the game.

qualitiesEasy.headline:
Own Bitcoin in
under 5 minutes
qualitiesEasy.text:
Buy, sell and send bitcoin nearly instantly.
Up to 250 € without registration.

qualitiesTransfer.headline:
Worldwide transfers
with no extra fees
qualitiesTransfer.text:
Send money to your loved ones abroad or
use your money internationally.

qualitiesPockets.headline:
Easy money overview
with unlimited pockets
qualitiesPockets.text: With traditional banks, you have to pay extra for sub-accounts. We save you money and give them for free.

safety.headline_2: Make it accessible everytime and everywhere.
safety.headline_text: “Not your keys, not your coins” has resulted in over $100 billion lost or stolen since the early 2010s. NewFinance prevents this by using the leading security technology - called MPC.
safety.text:
You get the safest security technology. Until now,
this was only used by institutions to secure billions of dollars.
safety.benefit2_2: to never lose access to your money

technology.headline_1: You can rely on future-proof technology.
technology.headline_2: It saves you time and money.
technology.subheadline_1:
Save up to 100 € booking fees
your bank normally charges
technology.subtext_1: Compared to other networks - by using lightning - you safe up to 99% payment fees.
technology.subtext_2: With bitcoin, you invest in the largest and oldest cryptocurrency, used by millions as a store of value.

cta.headline:
Secure your future with
Bitcoin + everything
your bank can do
cta.headline_1_xs: Join the new European way to better money —

about.headline: Simplify the way we use modern money.
about.headline_text_1: Money used to be independent and simple. You got cash in your pocket, you paid with it. Simple. But apps for the digital equivalent of cash - Bitcoin - are complex and confusing.
about.headline_text_2: Frustrated with complicated apps to protect our money in volatile times, we created NewFinance to build an simple but absolute secure place for our money.
about.headline_text_3: Three years researching and testing for the most secure and easy way brought us to this - NewFinance.
about.citation: “We were shocked. After building and testing NewFinance, we found out that it's not only save, but also saves a lot of fees in contrast to traditional finance.”
about.subheadline_text: Maximize your budget by using a technology that is independent and thus only costs a fraction of traditional finance.

contact.headline: How can we help you?
contact.text_founders: Let's talk directly with the founders and ask them questions.
contact.text_help: Ask product questions, report problems, or leave feedback.
contact.text_github: We are building community based and full Open-Source.
contact.text_x: Stay up to date with our newest features.
contact.text_medium: Check our insights on finance and better money.

pricing.headline: Pricing
pricing.text: Your strong plan, with all beta features included.
pricing.feature_1: Full access to your bank-like bitcoin account
pricing.extra_1_2: Live with the ending of beta phase.
pricing.extra_2_2: Nearly instant and with no extra fees.
pricing.extra_3_2: That can't be controlled or be blocked by others.
pricing.mica: All this - 100% compliant with the new MiCa regulation

waitlist.success: Congrats! You are on the waitlist.
